heading: HB00062
0: AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE POWERS OF THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7925, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ꞌPUBLIC TELECOMMUNICATIONS POLICY ACT OF THE PHILIPPINESꞌ
short-title: Strengthening The Powers Of The National Telecommunications Commission, Amending For The Purpose Republic Act No. 7925
status: Pending with the Committee on INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY since 2019-07-23
